data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jorge, Nina Castro, Cavalleri, Adriano, Bedetti, Cibele Souza, Isaias, Rosy Mary Dos Santos (2016): A new leaf-galling Holopothrips (Thysanoptera: Phlaeothripidae) and the structural alterations on Myrcia retorta (Myrtaceae). Zootaxa 4200 (1): 174-180, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4200.1.8|1 occurrence
